title: Radiant Diamond Kada Bangle Set - Contemporary Brilliance
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with brilliant-cut diamonds. Ethically sourced diamonds with SI clarity and G color. Features a durable Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: Modern geometric design with prong-set diamonds. Sleek, minimalist profile. The open design allows for easy wear and adjustability. The bangles are perfectly balanced for comfort and elegance.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or everyday elegance. Perfect for a Seemantham or a contemporary reception look.
description: This Diamond Kada set seamlessly blends modern design with traditional craftsmanship, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds offer exceptional brilliance and fire. A timeless piece for a discerning buyer.
